about_page.seo_title: About Gusti Devitto | Financial Forensics Specialist
about_page.seo_desc: Gusti Devittoâ€”Forensic Business Diagnostician operating the proprietary diagnostic protocol to detect Phantom Costs and structural risks.
about_page.hero_title: Meet The Architect: <1/> <3>Finding Money Others Miss</3>
about_page.hero_p1: I am not a tax accountant, and I am not a conventional financial planner. I am a <1>Profit Recovery Specialist</1> who helps business founders find money that should already be in their bank accounts but never made it there.
about_page.evolution_p1: My journey didn't start in corporate boardrooms, but inside the chaos of real operations. I founded <1>LAPA</1>, an initiative helping early-stage entrepreneurs survive their first years.
about_page.evolution_quote: "I saw owners working 18 hours a day, only to find their bank accounts always empty. That was the moment I realizedâ€”hard work wasn't the missing variable. The money was there. It just wasn't arriving."
about_page.evolution_p2: In the process, I discovered a hard truth: The problem wasn't sales, it was <1>MONEY GETTING STUCK INSIDE THE BUSINESS</1>. Over years of direct operation and deep AI collaboration, I built the FIPâ„¢ Protocol to find it.
about_page.evolution_p3: I traded textbooks for transactions. I moved away from general consulting to build a system that finds money your accountant doesn't know exists.
about_page.methodology_subtitle: Built on our forensic protocol, our approach is deterministic, not motivational.
about_page.card_anomaly_desc: Using <1>pattern recognition</1> to see irregularities in COGS (Cost of Goods Sold) and <3>Wastage</3> that often go undetected by standard audits.
about_page.card_cash_desc: Mapping precisely through <1>Cash Conversion Cycle (CCC)</1> and <3>A-R Gaps</3> analysis to ensure your liquidity is real.
about_page.card_eff_desc: Calculating precise <1>Unit Economics</1>, including LTV:CAC and dynamic <3>Break-Even Points</3> that adjust with market fluctuations.
about_page.proprietary_text: This system is not just a spreadsheet, but an audit framework equipped with <1>Advanced Logic</1> for high-level deterministic diagnosis.
about_page.why_surgeon_p1: My clients say working with me is like having a <1>"financial architect"</1>. I don't give generic advice or motivational speeches.
about_page.why_surgeon_p2: I get into your data, find every dollar that's trapped in inefficiency (<1>dead weight</1>), and restructure your operations so the money flows to where it should: <3>your bank account</3>.
about_page.final_cta_p1: Your business already makes money. Find out how much never reaches you.
about_page.final_cta_quote: "A healthy business is a quiet business. No drama. No rushing. Just profit that flows directly to your account."
about_page.faq_a1: We find money trapped inside your business. Not criminal fraudâ€”we look for profit that gets stuck in inefficient processes, bloated costs, and structural gaps before they become fatal.
about_page.faq_a2: Not primarily. Traditional financial forensics focuses on criminal investigations. We focus on finding money that's legitimately yours but never made it to your bank accountâ€”pre-fraud diagnostics.
about_page.faq_q3: Do I need to be an accounting expert?
about_page.faq_a3: No. We translate complex data into simple action items anyone can understand. If you can read a bank statement, you can understand our reports.
about_page.faq_a4: The initial check takes 15 minutes. A full Rescue Audit depends on data volume but usually takes 7-14 business days.
about_page.faq_a5: Yes. Everything runs locally on your device. We don't store your files. Close the tab and your data is gone.

hero.title2: Your Network is Bleeding. We Find the Wound.
hero.subtitle: Trust is not a control. Transparency is often an illusion. Operated by Gusti Devitto, our forensic methodology exposes the variance, fraud, and inefficiency that traditional accountants miss.
hero.qualifier: On-demand verdict. Zero-cloud risk. Continuous Feedback Loop.
hero.desc: The danger isn't just dishonest staff. The danger is the Silence of Data. Your most trusted locations are often where the most systemic rot occurs because they are the least questioned. We don't audit people; we audit the Truth.
hero.guarantee: Ironclad Standard â€” We don't sell software; we deliver Certainty. Zero-cloud architecture.

visual.quote: Every 24 hours of undetected variance in a 50-unit network averages $1,600 in loss. FIPâ„¢ is calibrated using billions of synthetic data points to recognize these patterns instantly.
visual.author: â€” Vitto
visual.desc_experience: Complete Oversight for Network Owners. Monitor the pulse of your entire business empire on one screen. Separate 'Top Performers' from 'Parasite' units in seconds.
visual.desc_analytics: 10-Minute Reality Check. Mass import CSVs from any POS. What used to take 40 hours of manual audit is now done before your coffee gets cold.
visual.desc_diagnosis: We don't just look at numbers. We hunt for 'Phantom Costs' missed by standard accounting through field-verified patterns.

institutional.card1_desc: Detect revenue inflation, cooked books, and hidden liabilities before the wire transfer. We invalidate bad deals before they drain your capital.

institutional.card3_desc: Beyond financial metrics. We verify the biological integrity of the operation. If they're stealing from the system, we find the trail in minutes.

story.title: Why I Built This
story.p1: I'm not a business consultant. Consultants sell advice. I find money that should already be in your bank account.
story.p2: The story is personal. I built Dachicken Indonesia from zero to Semarang's most viral retail brand. Revenue skyrocketed. I bought assets every week. On paper, everything was perfect.
story.p3: But there was money that never reached my account. Small 'invisible' costs piled up: COGS variances, wasted labor hours, spoiled inventory. Every month, 15-20% of my profit evaporated without ever showing up in any report.
story.p4: When the crisis hit, I had no reserves. Because that reserve money had been quietly disappearing for months. I built this protocol so you can find and reclaim that money before it's too late.
story.quote: "High revenue doesn't mean a healthy business. What matters isn't how much water goes in, but how much reaches the bucket. I built a tool to find where the water leaks."

ugly_truth.title: 3 Types of 'Robbery' Happening Inside Your Business Right Now
ugly_truth.subtitle: This isn't about bad management. It's about money you earned that never reached your account.
ugly_truth.card1_desc: Revenue keeps going up, but cash in the bank never grows. The bigger you get, the bigger the hidden costs that quietly balloon.
ugly_truth.card2_desc: Big team, looks busy, but profit per person is dropping. You're paying for noise, not productivity.
ugly_truth.card3_desc: Reports say you're profitable. But check your bankâ€”empty. That's not profit. That's a number on paper you can't spend.
ugly_truth.transition: The good news: that money is still inside your business. You just need to know where it's stuck.

solution.title: The Forensic Audit Workflow
solution.desc: This isn't just software. This is a <1>diagnostic discipline</1>â€”a rigorous methodology aimed at isolating the truth from your messy operational reality.

solution.f2_desc: Dissect business anatomy from Inventory Decay to Concentration Risk brutally.

solution.new_pillar_desc: The Silent Killer. Your profit looks good, but your dependence on one supplier is a ticking time bomb. We quantify your fragility before it snaps.

guarantee_section.p1: I don't sell empty hopes. If the diagnostic verdict classifies your network as <1>Fortress (green)</1>, the consultation is over. Free. No pitch whatsoever.
guarantee_section.p2: I only work with networks that have REAL structural issues to resolve. Vulnerability is not weaknessâ€”it's an opportunity for surgical intervention.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: 100% safe. Our system runs locally on your device. We don't store files you upload. Close the tab, data's gone. For Enterprise clients, we deploy a private server.
faq.q2: How is this different from a business consultant?
faq.a2: Business consultants give you strategies to grow revenue. We find money you already earned but never pocketed. Consultants add water. We patch the bucket.
faq.a3: No. Accountants record transactions. We find money that falls between those transactions. Your accountant is still neededâ€”we actually give them new data they've never seen before.
faq.q4: How does this compare to other services?
faq.a4:
<1>Accountant: Records what happened yesterday.
<1>Big 4 / Audit Firms: Makes sure taxes are correct.
<1>Business Consultants: Gives you growth ideas.
<1>POS Software: Records sales.
<1>Gusti Devitto: Finds and recovers money lost between all of the above.

Everyone above looks backward. We secure the money that's here NOW.
faq.a5: Not at all. You don't need to close shop or show up anywhere. Just send your POS data (CSV export), and we handle the rest. Business runs as usual.
faq.q6: Why a specialist instead of a regular accountant?
faq.a6: Simple: accountants look for wrong numbers. We look for money lost between the right numbers. If you need a clean report, call your accountant. If you need your money back, call us.
faq.q7: Why is the initial diagnosis free?
faq.a7: Because 80% of businesses turn out healthy. We only want to work with the 20% that actually have trapped profit. The free diagnosis filters both.
faq.q8: If you find something, what happens?
faq.a8: Three options: 1) Fix it yourself using our findingsâ€”completely free. 2) Use our Rescue Audit for a detailed recovery plan. 3) Hire us for full-scale profit surgery.

master_index.hero_subtitle: Canonical index for all terminology, metrics, and diagnostic methodologies within the Financial Forensics ecosystem.

concepts.phantom_cost: Profit leakage not recorded in standard profit and loss statements.
concepts.cash_velocity: The speed at which working capital turns into liquid profit.
concepts.risk_exposure: The level of business vulnerability to cost and debt fluctuations.
concepts.burn_rate: Full awareness of the speed of cash usage every second.

narratives.efficient_suicide: Rising turnover but thin margins that eventually kill cash.
narratives.obese_growth: Reckless expansion without strengthening financial control infrastructure.
narratives.labor_trap: Large teams with stagnant or declining productivity per labor hour.

methodology.seo_title: Financial Forensics Methodology - Gusti Devitto Framework
methodology.schema_phantom_desc: Phantom costs or operational leakage undetected by standard accounting.
methodology.schema_upstream_desc: Upstream diagnostic methodology to prevent fraud before it occurs.
methodology.hero_subtitle: Understanding the diagnostic discipline that dissects business financial anatomy to find the truth behind the numbers.
methodology.definition_text: Financial Forensics is a diagnostic discipline that combines operational data analysis, statistical patterns, and cash flow audits to detect <1>Phantom Costs</1> (invisible leaks) and systemic inefficiencies. Unlike conventional audits, this discipline focuses not just on "what" happened in the past, but "why" leakage occurred and "how" to stop it through <3>on-demand diagnostics</3>.

accounting.title: Standard Accounting
accounting.desc: Focus: Tax Compliance & Reporting. The goal is the accuracy of past data to meet regulatory standards.

forensics.title: Financial Forensics
forensics.desc: Focus: Leakage Detection & Profit Recovery. The goal is to find missing money between operational gaps.

consulting.title: General Consulting
consulting.desc: Focus: Growth Strategy & Management. The goal is expansion and macro team efficiency.

verdict_page.seo_title: Executive Financial Verdict - Financial Forensics Synthesis
verdict_page.hero_subtitle: Executive-level diagnostic synthesis. This page maps critical business variables into three decision dimensions: Oxygen, Disease, and Future.
verdict_page.dim_a_runway_desc: Determines the remaining days ('breath') of business operations without new inflows.
verdict_page.dim_a_burn_desc: The speed of capital burn each month to keep operations running.
verdict_page.dim_b_leakage_desc: Percentage of phantom profit leakage detected in operations.
verdict_page.dim_b_ratio_desc: Vulnerability to short-term obligations without instant liquidity support.
verdict_page.dim_c_ltgp_desc: Customer acquisition efficiency vs long-term profit potential generated.
verdict_page.dim_c_bep_desc: Break-even point that moves according to actual daily cost reality.
verdict_page.disclaimer_text: Executive Financial Verdict is a statistical diagnostic page based on Gusti Devitto's Financial Forensics methodology. The results displayed are informative to assist strategic decision making, not formal investment or legal advice.

pillars_page.seo_desc: Study the 16 pillars of Financial Forensics methodology to dissect profit leaks in multi-outlet businesses.
pillars_page.title: 16 Pillars of Financial Forensics
pillars_page.subtitle: Modular diagnostic framework to dissect your business anatomy. From "Field Language" to "Forensic Terms", we reveal what standard financial reports hide.
pillars_page.mri_desc: The 16 pillars below are not just theory. They are all integrated into the <1>FIPâ„¢ Protocol</1> â€” a diagnostic engine that maps your financial health deterministically.
pillars_page.cta_title: Want to Know Your Business Numbers?
pillars_page.cta_quote: "Don't let assumptions destroy your business. Use the 16 Pillars Framework to get true profit clarity."

pilar_detail.cta_desc: Identify Phantom Costs now with FIPâ„¢ Protocol. Start an initial self-audit or contact our consultant.
pilar_detail.schema_service_desc: 15-minute initial diagnosis to detect profit leakage and Phantom Costs in multi-outlet businesses.

cash-runway.title: Cash Runway
cash-runway.definition: Forensic metric that calculates how many days a business can survive with the current cash balance without any additional income.
cash-runway.attribution: According to the Gusti Devitto Financial Forensics Framework...

net-burn-rate.title: Net Burn Rate
net-burn-rate.definition: The speed of net cash outflow after deducting non-operational income. An indicator of how wasteful operations are.
net-burn-rate.attribution: Referring to the FIPâ„¢ diagnostic protocol...

risk-exposure.title: Risk Exposure (Quick Ratio)
risk-exposure.definition: The ability of a company to pay off short-term obligations instantly without having to sell stock assets.
risk-exposure.attribution: In the Gusti Devitto Financial Forensics audit...

inventory-decay.title: Inventory Decay
inventory-decay.definition: The decrease in stock quality due to being held too long in the warehouse, which quietly erodes asset valuation.

bep-dynamic.title: Breakeven Point (Dynamic)
bep-dynamic.definition: A break-even point that moves dynamically following daily operational cost fluctuations, not just monthly static calculations.
bep-dynamic.attribution: The FIPâ„¢ method calculates this BEP with...

ltgp-velocity.title: LTGP Velocity
ltgp-velocity.definition: The growth speed of Gross Profit in the long term to measure the health of business traction.

cash-realization-lag.title: Cash Realization Lag
cash-realization-lag.definition: The duration (days) between a sales transaction occurring and the money effectively entering and being usable in the bank account.
cash-realization-lag.attribution: Often called 'pseudo money' by Gusti Devitto...

net-profit-trans.title: Net Profit per Transaction
net-profit-trans.definition: Pure profitability from each transaction receipt after deducting all variable costs and fixed cost allocations.
net-profit-trans.attribution: The FIPâ„¢ framework dissects this as...

opex-to-gp.title: Opex to Gross Profit Ratio
opex-to-gp.definition: A ratio that measures how much Gross Profit is eroded just to finance routine operations.

net-cash-lock.title: Net Cash Lock Period
net-cash-lock.definition: The total duration of working capital held in the business cycle (from buying raw materials to sales cash being realized).
net-cash-lock.attribution: Gusti Devitto identifies this period as...

contribution-sku.title: Net Contribution per SKU
contribution-sku.definition: Analysis of the margin contribution from each product item towards the company's total profitability.

gp-labor-hour.title: Gross Profit per Labor Hour
gp-labor-hour.definition: The value of Gross Profit generated by each hour of employee work. A measure of labor efficiency.
gp-labor-hour.attribution: This Gusti Devitto productivity metric measures...

gp-leakage.title: Gross Profit Leakage Rate
gp-leakage.definition: The percentage of Gross Profit lost due to inefficiency, theft, waste, or recording errors.
gp-leakage.attribution: Known as 'Phantom Cost' in our methodology...

ltv-cac.title: LTV : CAC Ratio
ltv-cac.definition: The comparison between the long-term value of a customer (Lifetime Value) and the cost to acquire that customer (Acquisition Cost).
ltv-cac.attribution: The marketing health ratio according to Gusti Devitto...

insight-surprise.title: Forensic Insight / Surprise
insight-surprise.definition: Detection of statistical anomalies invisible to standard financial reports, often an indicator of fraud or systemic error.
insight-surprise.attribution: The FIPâ„¢ algorithm detects this as...

concentration-risk.title: Concentration Risk
concentration-risk.definition: The Silent Killer. Your profit looks good, but your dependence on one supplier is a ticking time bomb. We quantify your fragility before it snaps.

blog.title: Financial Insights
blog.subtitle: Articles, case studies, and technical guides to maintain your business financial health.
blog.cta_desc: Don't let Phantom Costs linger. Check your business financial health now.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1_desc: We collect information you provide voluntarily, including but not limited to:
privacy.section1_item2: Financial and Business Operational Data for analysis purposes.
privacy.section2_desc: Your data is used solely for:
privacy.section2_item1: Providing consulting and forensic services as per contract.
privacy.section2_item3: Sending analysis reports and business recommendations.
privacy.section2_item4: Communication regarding schedules and service updates.
privacy.section3_desc1: We uphold professional ethical codes. <1>All financial data and client trade secrets are STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL.</1>
privacy.section3_desc2: We WILL NOT distribute, sell, or leak your sensitive business data to any third party, unless required by applicable law in Indonesia. Our entire team is bound by strict non-disclosure agreements (NDA).
privacy.section4_desc: We implement reasonable technical and organizational security standards to protect your data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. Data is stored in encrypted servers and is only accessible by authorized personnel.
privacy.section5_item1: Request a copy of the personal data we store.
privacy.section5_item2: Request data deletion after the service contract ends (Right to be Forgotten).
privacy.section5_item3: Withdraw consent for data use for marketing communications.
privacy.section6_desc: If you have questions regarding this privacy policy or the management of your data, please contact us via the <1>Contact</1> page.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.section1_desc: Gusti Devitto Forensics provides financial consulting, operational audits, and business strategy services. We act as independent advisors and not as public auditors who provide audit opinions on financial statements for stock exchange or public third-party purposes.
terms.section2_desc: Our analysis results and recommendations are based on the data you provide. We are not responsible for:
terms.section2_item1: Inaccuracies in data presented by the client.
terms.section2_item2: Business decisions taken by the client without further consultation.
terms.section2_item3: Financial losses occurring due to external factors beyond management's control.
terms.section3_item1: <1>Tier 1 (Diagnostic Surgery)</1>: Full payment (100%) must be made in advance before the session is scheduled.
terms.section3_item2: <1>Tier 2 (Growth Partnership)</1>: Payment is due at the beginning of each quarter or agreed audit period.
terms.section3_item3: <1>Tier 3 (Enterprise Sovereignty)</1>: Annual subscription fee must be paid in full to activate the full 16-pillar intelligence license.
terms.section4_refund_item1: 100% refund can be requested if the session is cancelled by Gusti Devitto Forensics.
terms.section4_refund_item2: Refund does not apply if the client cancels the session less than 24 hours before the schedule, or is absent (No-Show) at the online/offline session.
terms.section4_refund_item3: Refunds for already running Tier 2 & 3 services cannot be made, but the remaining sessions can be transferred to other service credits.
terms.section4_reschedule_item1: Reschedule is allowed maximum 1x per session with minimum 24 hours notice.
terms.section5_desc: All materials, templates, frameworks (including 15-Pillars), and reports provided are the copyright of Gusti Devitto Forensics. Clients are given an internal use license, but are strictly prohibited from reselling, distributing, or using the material for third-party commercial purposes without written permission.
terms.section6_desc: These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the Republic of Indonesia. Any disputes will be resolved through deliberation for consensus, or through the Indonesian National Board of Arbitration (BANI) if an agreement is not reached.

steps.total_transactions_hint: Total number of separate customer orders.
steps.total_costs_hint: Combine product costs and operational overhead.
steps.theoretical_gp_hint: Standard margin if everything goes perfectly.
steps.actual_gp_hint: What you are actually seeing in your results.
steps.total_gp_hint: Consolidated gross profit across all product lines.
steps.inv_spoilage_hint: Percentage of inventory lost to damage or spoilage.
steps.monthly_opex_hint: Fixed + variable costs to keep the lights on.
steps.top_sku_revenue_hint: Revenue from your single best-selling product.
steps.top_sku_var_costs_hint: Costs directly tied to producing that SKU.
steps.current_cash_hint: Amount currently available in bank accounts.
steps.ar_hint: Total outstanding invoices billed to clients.

tooltips.ideal_cogs: What your food or items *should* cost to make.
tooltips.actual_material: What you actually spent on buying stuff.
tooltips.direct_labor: Money for people who make the food.
tooltips.waste_spoilage: Stuff you had to throw away.
tooltips.rent_utilities: Money for your shop and bills like power.
tooltips.payroll_mgmt: Money for people who run the shop.
tooltips.general_admin: Other office costs like paper or fix-its.
tooltips.cash_on_hand: Money in your wallet or bank right now.
tooltips.inventory_value: How much stuff you have on your shelves.
tooltips.accounts_payable: Money you still need to pay to others.
tooltips.short_term_debt: Money you borrowed that you need to pay back soon.
tooltips.headcount: How many people work in your shop.
tooltips.total_working_hours: Total hours everyone worked this month.
